item.title: Resume
item.description: Professional Experience Link to heading 03/2022 - 09/2022 | Python Backend Developer, COCUS AG, Düsseldorf Development & Deployment of applications in AWS Realization of REST-APIs, GraphQL Services & AWS Lambdas in a Vodafone project Focus on clean code, design patterns and unit testing Working in an agile environment (SCRUM) Stack: Python, AWS, Gitlab CI/CD, Serverless, Elasticsearch, Docker, GraphQL, MongoDB 08/2021 - 02/2022 | Research assistant, Bergische Universität Wuppertal, Wuppertal
